events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product I got is not what I ordered.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery as per customer message.
Assigning this refund case to the billing and refunds specialist team for further processing.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a clear photo of the item that I received instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and provide a prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund and return label offer and will send the item back shortly.
We confirm your refund has been processed and should appear on your statement shortly. Thank you for returning the product.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and that everything has been fully resolved to your satisfaction.
Since all issues have been addressed and the refund was successful, we are closing this support case. Please contact us if anything else arises.
